class.name: AwaitTweener
class.brief_description: Suspends a [Tween] animation until a signal has been emitted.
class.description: [AwaitTweener] is used to make a tweening sequence wait for a signal to be emitted. See [method Tween.tween_await] for more usage information. [b]Note:[/b] [method Tween.tween_await] is the only correct way to create [AwaitTweener]. Any [AwaitTweener] created manually will not function correctly.
